item.title: Meet Zohran Mamdani, the Favorite to Lead New York City
item.description: Our reporters explore his skyrocket, his life and his appeal.

item.title: Gov. Janet Mills of Maine to Run for Senate, Aiming at Senator Susan Collins
item.description: A two-term Democratic governor, Ms. Mills called herself “battle tested” in an interview. But she faces a Democratic primary before she can challenge ...

item.title: Slowing Electric Vehicle Sales Will Cost G.M. $1.6 Billion
item.description: General Motors said it would lower its earnings by that amount to mainly reflect the drop in the value of equipment, factories and other assets.

item.title: Ukraine’s Formula for Peace: Fewer Talks, More Weapons
item.description: As Russia rebuffs President Trump’s diplomatic push, President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine plans to head again to the White House, this time seeking...

item.title: California Forecast: Early-Season Storm Brings a Deluge of Rain
item.description: The rare October storm could cause mudslides and debris flow, forecasters said. Some residents in Los Angeles County have been told to evacuate.
